research.title: Gum Disease & Heart Health
research.summary: New findings link gum health with cardiovascular health, showing stronger connections between oral and systemic health.

research.title: Invisalign Effectiveness in Adults
research.summary: A comparative study on the effectiveness of Invisalign versus traditional braces in adult orthodontics.

research.title: AI in Dental Imaging
research.summary: A review on how artificial intelligence is improving dental diagnostics through advanced imaging analysis.

research.title: Nanotechnology in Oral Care
research.summary: Exploring nanotech-based dental products for enamel protection and cavity prevention.

research.title: Laser Dentistry Advances
research.summary: An in-depth review of the effectiveness of laser-assisted cavity treatment and gum reshaping.

research.title: Saliva-Based Diagnostics
research.summary: Saliva testing as a non-invasive diagnostic tool for detecting systemic diseases early.

research.title: 3D Printing in Dentistry
research.summary: Applications of 3D printing for custom dental implants, crowns, and aligners.

research.title: Biocompatible Dental Materials
research.summary: The development of new materials that are safer and more durable for dental restorations.

research.title: Sleep Apnea & Oral Devices
research.summary: Case studies showing the role of oral appliances in managing sleep apnea effectively.

research.title: Regenerative Dentistry
research.summary: Exploring stem cell therapy and tissue engineering for tooth regeneration.
